name: Ambush
effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player suffers 1 damage.

name: Conduct
effect: Unleash. The player with the most charges suffers 2 damage and gains a charge.

name: Creeping Curse
effect:
To Discard: Spend 6 Æ.

Power 3: Unleash. Any player suffers 2 damage. The players collectively discad two cards in hand.

name: Daze
effect: Any player suffers 2 damage and discards a card in hand. If that card costs 0 Æ, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Endless Chasm
effect:
To Discard: Spend 6 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Aether Extract
effect: Power 2: Unleash. Any player discards two gems. If both of those gems cost 0 Æ, Unleash.

name: Ravenous Leviathan
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Spine Thresher
effect: Persistent: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage.

name: Caustic Cocoon
effect: Persistent: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.

name: Sap
effect: Unleash twice. Any player loses 2 charges. OR Unleash twice. Any player suffers 3 damage.

name: Tremor
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Drain
effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Then, if any player has a prepped spell that costs 4 Æ or more, Unleash.

name: Humming Hive
effect: Persistent: Any player suffers 2 damage.

name: Hunted
effect: Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 1 damage.

name: Tempting Offer
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 3: Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 3 damage.

name: Annihilate
effect: Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive card in hand discards two cards in hand. Then, for each card in that players hand that costs 2 Æ or more, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Facet Ogre
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to the number of shield tokens this minion has. If this minion has two or less shield tokens, it gains one shield token.

name: Flash of Decay
effect: Power 2: Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive prepped spell destroys it. If that spell costs 4 Æ or less, or no spell was destroyed, Unleash.

name: Gathering Storm
effect:
To Discard: Spend 8 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. If there are two nemesis turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, any player suffers 4 damage. Otherwise, Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Maddening Spectre
effect: Persistent: Unleash twice.

name: Scatter
effect: Unleash twice. Any player destroys their most expensive card in hand.

name: Suffocate
effect: Unleash three times. OR Gravehold suffers 3 damage and any player suffes 3 damage.
